name: Pulp Diction: Word Detective
description:
Welcome to the Pulp Diction Detective Agency!

Solving crimes is as easy as finding words at the crime scene!

Make words by tapping a series of adjoining letters. The letters can zigzag around the board. Tap the last letter twice to submit the word and score the points.

Work your way through the detective ranks, tackling more challenging cases!

  • Solve a variety of different challenges.
  • Use the letters with a CLOCK to give yourself a time bonus.
  • Use the letters with a MAGNIFYING GLASS, which can then be used to shuffle the board.

Remember, you can always go at your own pace! Every case solved will earn points, and there's no rush to do the harder cases.

Pulp Diction was created by Murray Lorden, a game developer from Melbourne, Australia.
